name: R2-D2 (Artoo-Detoo) (V)
Lore: 'Fiesty. Loyal. Heroic. Insecure. Rebel spy. Excels at trouble. Incorrigible counterpart of a mindless philosopher. Has picked up a slight flutter. A bit eccentric.',
Text: 'During a battle with C-3PO, may not be targeted by weapons. While aboard a starfighter, it is power, maneuver, and hyperspeed +3. Unless you have 13 or more cards in hand, opponent may not place those cards in Used Pile.',
